entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
